attributes.action: Force company's to reduce petrol and diesel price below 1£ in stations.
attributes.background: Petrol prices have fallen to their lowest since August 2009, helped by fierce supermarket competition bringing a litre below a £1 on all of the Big 4’s forecourts. Diesel prices, although at their lowest since October 2009, have yet to reflect a lower wholesale cost than petrol’s.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The price of petrol and diesel is the responsibility of petrol companies.

However, you could sign the following petition calling for the Government to reduce fuel duty:

 https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104695
